item.title: How to copy files temporarily in Dockerfile
item.description: It’s very common to copy a local file into the container when build docker image. In general, we use COPY command. But it creates a new layer and increase the final image size. If this is a temporal file and we don’t want users waste their storage space, how can we remove it? Here are some approaches.
